statements: DELETE FROM comedy_specials WHERE comedian = 'John Mulaney';
DELETE FROM comedy_specials WHERE genre = 'Stand-up Comedy' AND rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM ComedySpecials WHERE release_year = 2020 AND genre = 'Stand-up';
DELETE FROM ComedySpecials WHERE genre = 'Stand-up' AND release_year < 2000;

DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE genre_preference = 'Stand-up Comedy' AND user_id = 789;

DELETE FROM SpecialGenre WHERE genre_id = 2 AND special_id = 3;
